name: Java SecurityManager basics
description:
As you can see, the test code installs a SecurityManager.

Your job is to disable it.

Your code has [all permissions](https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/11/docs/api/java.base/java/security/AllPermission.html).  
Use them. And don't let the unprivileged Test class on the stack prevent you from doing that.
